response.original_title: Cartoons R Fun: Daffy Duck "Scrap Happy"
response.overview: This VHS tape features beloved cartoon character Daffy Duck in "Scrap Happy". The film is rated G and is suitable for children and families. The language is in English and the tape has not been a former rental. This is a Collector's Edition from Warner Home Video and was manufactured in the United States
response.title: Cartoons R Fun: Daffy Duck "Scrap Happy"
